dialogue_turns.speaker: Host
dialogue_turns.text: Late 2024, and President Tokayev is in Shymkent for a working visit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Late twenty twenty four, and President Tokayev is in Shymkent for a working visit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he's there to review the city's socio-economic development, according to Akorda.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he's there to review the city's socio-economic development, according to Akorda.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has arrived in Shymkent for a working visit, according to Akorda. During the trip, the Head of State is expected to review the city's socio-economic development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, they mentioned a special meeting is planned too, focusing on recent shifts in global markets.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, they mentioned a special meeting is planned too, focusing on recent shifts in global markets.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Akorda announced that a special meeting with the President would take place, focusing on recent shifts in global markets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes sense, given the context—he just met with Prime Minister Bektenov and National Bank Chairman Suleimenov about the economy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes sense, given the context-he just met with Prime Minister Bektenov and National Bank Chairman Suleimenov about the economy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, Tokayev held a meeting with Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov, National Bank Chairman Timur Suleimenov, and other senior officials to discuss the state of the economy amid a sharp decline in energy and commodity prices triggered by global tariff disputes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the economy's under pressure from that sharp decline in energy and commodity prices.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the economy's under pressure from that sharp decline in energy and commodity prices.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, Tokayev held a meeting with Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov, National Bank Chairman Timur Suleimenov, and other senior officials to discuss the state of the economy amid a sharp decline in energy and commodity prices triggered by global tariff disputes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, all these global tariff disputes are really shaking things up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, all these global tariff disputes are really shaking things up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, Tokayev held a meeting with Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov, National Bank Chairman Timur Suleimenov, and other senior officials to discuss the state of the economy amid a sharp decline in energy and commodity prices triggered by global tariff disputes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So it's a pretty critical moment for them to be assessing both local and international impacts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's a pretty critical moment for them to be assessing both local and international impacts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. You don't bring in the Prime Minister and the National Bank head for no reason.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. You don't bring in the Prime Minister and the National Bank head for no reason.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: No, that's high-level crisis management, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, that's high-level crisis management, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And holding the meeting in Shymkent—interesting choice, right? Not the capital.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And holding the meeting in Shymkent-interesting choice, right? Not the capital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Maybe signaling that regional development is tied to these bigger economic issues.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Maybe signaling that regional development is tied to these bigger economic issues.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Could be. It's not just about Almaty or Nur-Sultan; the whole country's feeling this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Could be. It's not just about Almaty or Nur-Sultan; the whole country's feeling this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. I'm curious what specific plans come out of this visit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. I'm curious what specific plans come out of this visit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Same here. With energy prices down, they've got to pivot, maybe focus on other sectors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Same here. With energy prices down, they've got to pivot, maybe focus on other sectors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Tough spot, but important moves happening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Tough spot, but important moves happening.
